alert.note: Alert for Muskogee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 3:18PM CDT until May 06 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Caney River near Collinsville affecting Tulsa and Rogers Counties. Arkansas River near Muskogee affecting Muskogee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River near Muskogee. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, areas on the grounds of the OG&E power plant are flooded. Moderate agricultural flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 29.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 31.6 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
